controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    class Controller - A class used as controller in the Model View Controller design. The model is represented by the a Restaurant type object and the controller is managing the GUI classes from the presentationLayer package that receives input from the user.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  Controller.CreateBillListener
      class CreateBillListener used to create a Bill text file with the information of the ordered products along with their prices and a total price
      (package private) class  Controller.CreateItemListener
      class CreateItemListener used as a listener for creating a menu item at the request of the user.
      (package private) class  Controller.CreateOrderListener
      class CreateOrderListener used as a listener for creating an order
      (package private) class  Controller.DeleteItemListener
      class DeleteItemListener used as a listener for deleting a menu item at the request of the user.
      (package private) class  Controller.EditItemListener
      class EditItemListener used as a listener for editing a menu item at the request of the user.
      (package private) class  Controller.ExitListener
      class ExitListener used as a listener when exiting from the program - it has the purpose of serialization of the Restaurant Object used in the program
      (package private) class  Controller.RefreshListener
      class RefreshListener used as a listener for refreshing the GUI list of the orders in the chef graphical user interface.
